title: PMRI-Based Microlearning Integrated Course for Probability Concept and Reasoning Skill Development

context.prior_knowledge: Basic statistical concepts and mathematical computation skills
context.additional_context: Course focused on strengthening field problem-solving capabilities using probabilistic reasoning for professionals in medical, legal, and technical fields

learning_goals: Learners can apply fundamental probability concepts (conditional probability, independence, etc.) to real-world job scenarios.
Learners can solve complex probability problems using comic-based microlearning materials grounded in the PMRI approach.
Through project-based assessments, learners systematically document and present probabilistic reasoning processes.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
